entry.title: BENTZ CO-SPONSORS SECURE RURAL SCHOOLS REAUTHORIZATION ACT
entry.summary: February 17, 2025 3:50 a.m. On Friday, Congressman Cliff Bentz joined a bipartisan group of members of the House in introducing the Secure Rural Schools Reauthorization Act. A release from Bentz said that first enacted in 2000, the legislation provides funding for schools, roads, and essential services in counties with significant amounts of tax-exempt federal...

entry.title: SUTHERLIN POLICE DEPARTMENT NAMES OFFICER OF THE YEAR
entry.summary: February 17, 2025 3:40 a.m. The Sutherlin Police Department has named Officer Jonathan Rausch as the 2024 Police Officer of the Year. Each year the Roseburg Optimist Club holds the Respect for Law Banquet. As a result, SPD holds nominations within the police department for the Officer of the Year. This year, Officer Jonathan Rausch...

entry.title: ROSEBURG HIGH SCHOOL THEATRE WITH SPRING MUSICAL

entry.title: HUMAN TRAFFICKING TASK FORCE WITH DOCUMENTRY ON THURSDAY

entry.title: MONTHS-LONG INVESTIGATION LEADS TO RECOVERY OF STOLEN VEHICLES, MULTIPLE ARRESTS
entry.summary: February 16, 2025 2:50 p.m. A months-long investigation in northern Douglas County has concluded with the successful recovery of numerous stolen vehicles and property, as well as multiple arrests. entry.title: FREE FISHING DAYS SATURDAY AND SUNDAY
entry.summary: February 14, 2025 3:05 a.m. The Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife is offering free fishing days in Oregon this weekend, in honor of President’s Day on Monday.
